original_text: But you will have trouble if you turn away from God and you do not obey him. If you decide to serve other gods and to worship them, 18 you will certainly come to an end. After you go across the Jordan River, you will not live very long in that land. That is what I am telling you today.
korean_text: 그러나 네가 만일 마음을 돌이켜 듣지 아니하고 유혹을 받아 다른 신들에게 절하고 그를 섬기면

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 고통을 겪게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: if you turn away from God
and you do not obey him
If you decide to serve other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 다른 신들을 섬기기로 결정한다면

sentences.original_text: you will certainly come to an end
After you go across the Jordan River
you will not live very long in that land
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 땅에서 오래 살지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what I am telling you today
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 오늘 너에게 말하는 것이다
